00262 
00263 std::string CCDFFileData::GetProbeSetName(int index)
00264 {
00265   if (iteratorReader.is_open() == false) {
00266     return m_ProbeSetNames.GetName(index);
00267   }
00268 
00269   int loc = (int)probeSetNamePos + (index*MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00270   seekg(loc, std::ios::beg);
00271   char name[MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH + 1];
00272   ReadFixedCString(iteratorReader, name, MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00273   return name;
00274 }

00278 void CCDFFileData::Close()
00279 {
00280     if (iteratorReader.is_open() == true)
00281         iteratorReader.close();
00282         m_ProbeSets.clear();
00283         m_QCProbeSets.clear();
00284         m_ProbeSetNames.Clear();
00285 }

00289 bool CCDFFileData::IsXDACompatibleFile()
00290 {
00291         // Open the file.
00292         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00293         if (!instr)
00294                 return false;
00295 
00296         // Read the magic number from the file.
00297         int32_t magic=0;
00298         ReadInt32_I(instr, magic);
00299         bool bXDAFile = (magic == CDF_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER);
00300         instr.close();
00301 
00302         return bXDAFile;
00303 }

00306 
00307 std::string CCDFFileData::GetChipType() const
00308 {
00309         std::string chiptype;
00310         if (m_FileName.empty() == false)
00311         {
00312                 int index = (int) m_FileName.rfind('\\');
00313                 if (index == -1)
00314                         index = (int) m_FileName.rfind('/');
00315                 chiptype = m_FileName.c_str() + index + 1;
00316                 chiptype.resize(chiptype.length()-4);
00317         }
00318         return chiptype;
00319 }
00320 
00322 
00323 std::vector<std::string> CCDFFileData::GetChipTypes() const
00324 {
00325     std::vector<std::string> chiptypes;
00326     std::string chiptype;
00327         if (m_FileName.empty() == false)
00328         {
00329                 int index = (int) m_FileName.rfind('\\');
00330                 if (index == -1)
00331                         index = (int) m_FileName.rfind('/');
00332                 chiptype = m_FileName.c_str() + index + 1;
00333                 chiptype.resize(chiptype.length()-4);
00334         }
00335     // The full file name (minus .cdf extension) is the default (1st) 
00336     // chip type. This matches what GetChipType() returns.
00337     // ie: foo.bar.v1.r2.cdf -> foo.bar.v1.r2
00338     chiptypes.push_back(chiptype);
00339 
00340     //We then add all substrings starting at zero and ending at '.'
00341     // ie: foo.bar.v1.r2.cdf -> foo.bar.v1, foo.bar, foo
00342     std::string::size_type pos = chiptype.rfind(".",chiptype.size()-1);
00343     while (pos != std::string::npos){
00344         if(pos>0)
00345             chiptypes.push_back(chiptype.substr(0,pos));
00346         pos = chiptype.rfind(".",pos-1);
00347     }
00348 
00349     //ie: foo.bar.v1.r2, foo.bar.v1, foo.bar, foo
00350         return chiptypes;
00351 }

00355 bool CCDFFileData::Exists()
00356 {
00357         // Find the file stats.
00358         struct stat st;
00359         return (stat(m_FileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00360 }

00364 bool CCDFFileData::ReadHeader()
00365 {
00366         // Read the header, close if failed.
00367     readHeaderOnly = true;
00368         if (Open() == false)
00369         {
00370                 Close();
00371                 return false;
00372         }
00373         return true;
00374 }

00377 
00378 GeneChipProbeSetType CCDFFileData::GetProbeSetType(int index)
00379 {
00380         if (iteratorReader.is_open() == false) {
00381                 return m_ProbeSets[index].GetProbeSetType();
00382   }
00383 
00384   uint32_t i_pos;
00385   uint32_t p_pos;
00386   
00387   // Get the probe set position from the index part of the file then seek to it.
00388   i_pos=(uint32_t) probeSetIndexPos + (index*sizeof(uint32_t));
00389   iteratorReader.seekg(i_pos, std::ios::beg); // the seekg method will be called later.
00390   ReadUInt32_I(iteratorReader,p_pos);
00391   // skip to the record
00392   seekg(p_pos, std::ios::beg);
00393 
00394   // Now grab the probeset type.
00395   uint16_t usval;
00396   ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00397   return (GeneChipProbeSetType)(usval);
00398 }
00399 
00401 
00402 void CCDFFileData::GetProbeSetInformation(int index, CCDFProbeSetInformation & info)
00403 {
00404         if (iteratorReader.is_open() == false) {
00405                 info.MakeShallowCopy(m_ProbeSets[index]);
00406     return;
00407   }
00408 
00409   uint32_t i_pos;
00410   uint32_t p_pos;
00411 
00412   // Is this a sequential read?
00413   // Are we just reading the next record?
00414   // If so no, need to seek around.
00415   // NOTE: Of course this expects the records to be next to each other.
00416   //       |Rec:1......|Rec:2......|Rec:.....
00417   if ((m_probeSetIndex_last_valid!=1)||(index!=m_probeSetIndex_last+1)) {
00418     // Nope! Look it it in the index.
00419     i_pos = (uint32_t)probeSetIndexPos + (index*sizeof(uint32_t));
00420     iteratorReader.seekg(i_pos, std::ios::beg);
00421     ReadUInt32_I(iteratorReader, p_pos);
00422     // now seek to the probe pos.
00423     iteratorReader.seekg(p_pos,std::ios::beg);
00424   }
00425   // remember which index we just read.
00426   m_probeSetIndex_last_valid=1;
00427   m_probeSetIndex_last=index;
00428 
00429   // Read the data
00430   uint16_t usval;
00431   uint8_t ucval;
00432   int32_t ival;
00433   
00434   info.m_Index = index;
00435   ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00436   info.m_ProbeSetType = usval;
00437   ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00438   info.m_Direction = ucval;
00439   ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00440   info.m_NumLists = ival;
00441   ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00442   info.m_NumGroups = ival;
00443   ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00444   info.m_NumCells = ival;
00445   ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00446   info.m_ProbeSetNumber = ival;
00447   ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00448   info.m_NumCellsPerList = ucval;
00449     
00450   // Read the Groups
00451   CCDFProbeGroupInformation *pBlk;
00452   info.m_Groups.resize(info.m_NumGroups);
00453   info.m_pGroups = &info.m_Groups;
00454   for (int j=0; j<info.m_NumGroups; j++)
00455                 {
00456                         pBlk = &info.m_Groups[j];
00457                         pBlk->m_GroupIndex = j;
00458       
00459                         // Group info
00460                         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00461                         pBlk->m_NumLists = ival;
00462                         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00463                         pBlk->m_NumCells = ival;
00464                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00465                         pBlk->m_NumCellsPerList = ucval;
00466                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00467                         pBlk->m_Direction = ucval;
00468                         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00469                         pBlk->m_Start = ival;
00470                         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00471                         pBlk->m_Stop = ival;
00472                         ReadFixedString(iteratorReader, pBlk->m_Name, MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00473       
00474                         // Read the cells
00475                         CCDFProbeInformation *pCell;
00476                         pBlk->m_Cells.resize(pBlk->m_NumCells);
00477       pBlk->m_pCells = &pBlk->m_Cells;
00478                         for (int k=0; k<pBlk->m_NumCells; k++)
00479         {
00480           pCell = &pBlk->m_Cells[k];
00481           
00482           // Cell info.
00483           ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00484           pCell->m_ListIndex = ival;
00485           ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00486           pCell->m_X = usval;
00487           ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00488           pCell->m_Y = usval;
00489           ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00490           pCell->m_Expos = ival;
00491           ReadUInt8(iteratorReader,ucval);
00492           pCell->m_PBase = ucval;
00493           ReadUInt8(iteratorReader,ucval);
00494           pCell->m_TBase = ucval;
00495           
00496           if (k==0)
00497             pBlk->m_Start = pCell->m_ListIndex;
00498           else if (k == pBlk->m_NumCells-1)
00499             pBlk->m_Stop = pCell->m_ListIndex;
00500         }
00501                 }
00502 }
00503 
00505 
00506 void CCDFFileData::GetQCProbeSetInformation(GeneChipQCProbeSetType qcType, CCDFQCProbeSetInformation & info)
00507 {
00508         bool bFound = false;
00509         for (int i=0; i<m_Header.GetNumQCProbeSets() && bFound == false; i++)
00510         {
00511                 GetQCProbeSetInformation(i, info);
00512                 if (info.GetQCProbeSetType() == qcType)
00513                         bFound = true;
00514         }
00515         if (bFound == false)
00516                 info.m_NumCells = 0;
00517 }
00518 
00520 
00521 void CCDFFileData::GetQCProbeSetInformation(int index, CCDFQCProbeSetInformation & info)
00522 {
00523         if (iteratorReader.is_open() == false)
00524                 info.MakeShallowCopy(m_QCProbeSets[index]);
00525         else
00526         {
00527     // Get the QC position from the index part of the file then seek to it.
00528     int32_t pos = (int32_t)qcSetIndexPos + (index*sizeof(int32_t));
00529     seekg(pos, std::ios::beg);
00530     ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, pos);
00531     seekg(pos, std::ios::beg);
00532 
00533     // Read the data
00534     uint16_t usval;
00535     int32_t ival;
00536     unsigned char ucval;
00537     
00538                 ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00539                 ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00540 
00541     info.m_NumCells = ival;
00542                 info.m_QCProbeSetType = usval;
00543     info.m_Cells.resize(info.m_NumCells);
00544     info.m_pCells = &info.m_Cells;
00545 
00546                 // Read the cells
00547                 for (int j=0; j<info.m_NumCells; j++)
00548                 {
00549                         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00550                         info.m_Cells[j].m_X = usval;
00551 
00552                         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00553                         info.m_Cells[j].m_Y = usval;
00554 
00555                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00556                         info.m_Cells[j].m_PLen = ucval;
00557 
00558                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00559                         info.m_Cells[j].m_PMProbe = ucval;
00560 
00561                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00562                         info.m_Cells[j].m_Background = ucval;
00563                 }
00564         }
00565 }

00576                 return false;

00580 
00582 
00583 bool CCDFFileData::Open()
00584 {
00585         // First close the file.
00586         Close();
00587 
00588         // Open the file.
00589         if (IsXDACompatibleFile())
00590                 return ReadXDAFormat();
00591         else
00592                 return ReadTextFormat();
00593 }
00594 
00596 
00597 bool CCDFFileData::ReadXDAHeader()
00598 {
00599         // Extact the magic and version numbers.
00600         int32_t ival;
00601         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00602         m_Header.m_Magic = ival;
00603         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00604         m_Header.m_Version = ival;
00605 
00606         // Check the values for the right format file.
00607         if (m_Header.m_Magic != CDF_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER || m_Header.m_Version > CDF_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER)
00608         {
00609                 m_strError = "The file does not appear to be the correct format.";
00610                 return false;
00611         }
00612 
00613         // Read the remaining header.
00614         uint16_t uval;
00615         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, uval);
00616         m_Header.m_Cols = uval;
00617         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, uval);
00618         m_Header.m_Rows = uval;
00619         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00620         m_Header.m_NumProbeSets = ival;
00621         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00622         m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets = ival;
00623         ReadString_I(iteratorReader,m_Header.m_Reference);
00624         return true;
00625 }
00626 
00628 
00629 bool CCDFFileData::ReadXDAFormat()
00630 {
00631         // Open the file.
00632         iteratorReader.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00633 
00634         // Check if open
00635         if (!iteratorReader)
00636         {
00637                 m_strError = "Unable to open the file.";
00638                 return false;
00639         }
00640 
00641         // Read the header.
00642         if (ReadXDAHeader() == false)
00643                 return false;
00644 
00645         // Save the probe set name position
00646         probeSetNamePos = iteratorReader.tellg();
00647         // Skip the probe set names
00648         seekg(MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH * m_Header.m_NumProbeSets, std::ios::cur);
00649 
00650   // remember the start of the qc index
00651   qcSetIndexPos = iteratorReader.tellg();
00652         // Skip it
00653         seekg(m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets * sizeof(uint32_t), std::ios::cur);
00654 
00655   // remember the start of the probeset index
00656   probeSetIndexPos = iteratorReader.tellg();
00657   // invalidate 
00658   m_probeSetIndex_last_valid=0;
00659 
00660         return true;
00661 }
00662 
00664 
00665 bool CCDFFileData::ReadTextFormat()
00666 {
00667         // Open the file.
00668         std::ifstream instr;
00669         instr.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
00670 
00671         // Check if open
00672         if (!instr)
00673         {
00674                 m_strError = "Unable to open the file.";
00675                 return false;
00676         }
00677 
00678         const int MAXLINELENGTH = 4096;
00679         char str[MAXLINELENGTH];
00680         char *subStr;
00681         const char *CDFVERSION1 = "GC1.0";
00682         const char *CDFVERSION2 = "GC2.0";
00683         const char *CDFVERSION3 = "GC3.0";
00684 
00685         // Get the CDF section.
00686         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00687         if (strncmp( str, "[CDF]", 5) != 0)
00688         {
00689                 m_strError = "Unknown file format.";
00690                 return false;
00691         }
00692 
00693         // Get the version number.
00694         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00695         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00696         if ( strncmp( subStr, CDFVERSION1, strlen(CDFVERSION1)) == 0)
00697                 m_Header.m_Version = 1;
00698         else if ( strncmp( subStr, CDFVERSION2, strlen(CDFVERSION2)) == 0)
00699                 m_Header.m_Version = 2;
00700         else if ( strncmp( subStr, CDFVERSION3, strlen(CDFVERSION3)) == 0)
00701                 m_Header.m_Version = 3;
00702 
00703 
00704         // Get the next section.
00705         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // [Chip]
00706         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // name
00707         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // rows
00708         subStr = strchr(str, '=')+1;
00709         m_Header.m_Rows = atoi(subStr);
00710         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // cols
00711         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00712         m_Header.m_Cols = atoi(subStr);
00713         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // #ProbeSets
00714         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00715         m_Header.m_NumProbeSets = atoi(subStr);
00716         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // max ProbeSet number
00717         m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets = 0;
00718         if (m_Header.m_Version > 1)
00719         {
00720                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // #qc ProbeSets
00721                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00722                 m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets = atoi(subStr);
00723                 char strref[65000];
00724                 ReadNextLine(instr, strref, 65000);     // The reference string.
00725                 subStr=strchr(strref,'=')+1;
00726                 m_Header.m_Reference = subStr;
00727         }
00728 
00729 
00730         // Stop if just reading the header.
00731         if (readHeaderOnly)
00732                 return true;
00733 
00734 
00735 
00736         // Allocate for the probe set names.
00737         m_ProbeSetNames.Resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
00738 
00739         // Allocate for the QCProbeSets.
00740         CCDFQCProbeSetInformation *pQCProbeSet;
00741         m_QCProbeSets.resize(m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets);
00742 
00743         // Read the QC probe sets
00744         for (int iQCProbeSet=0; iQCProbeSet<m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets; iQCProbeSet++)
00745         {
00746                 pQCProbeSet = &m_QCProbeSets[iQCProbeSet];
00747 
00748                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);        // label [QCUnit...]
00749                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);        // type
00750                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00751                 pQCProbeSet->m_QCProbeSetType = atoi( subStr);
00752                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);        // #cells
00753                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00754                 pQCProbeSet->m_NumCells = atoi( subStr);
00755                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);        // cell header
00756 
00757                 // Read the QC cells.
00758                 int xqc;
00759                 int yqc;
00760                 int plenqc;
00761                 CCDFQCProbeInformation *pQCCell;
00762                 pQCProbeSet->m_Cells.resize(pQCProbeSet->m_NumCells);
00763                 for (int iqccell=0; iqccell<pQCProbeSet->m_NumCells; iqccell++)
00764                 {
00765                         pQCCell = &pQCProbeSet->m_Cells[iqccell];
00766 
00767                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00768                         subStr = strchr(str, '=')+1;
00769 
00770                         sscanf(subStr, "%d %d %*s %d",
00771                                         &xqc,
00772                                         &yqc,
00773                                         &plenqc);
00774 
00775                         pQCCell->m_X = xqc;
00776                         pQCCell->m_Y = yqc;
00777                         pQCCell->m_PLen = plenqc;
00778                         pQCCell->m_Background = 0;
00779                         pQCCell->m_PMProbe = 0;
00780                 }
00781         }
00782 
00783 
00784         // Allocate for the ProbeSets.
00785         int iProbeSet=0;
00786         CCDFProbeSetInformation *pProbeSet;
00787         m_ProbeSets.resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
00788 
00789 
00790         // Skip until the ProbeSet section is found
00791 NextProbeSet:
00792         while (1)
00793         {
00794                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00795                 if (strlen(str) > 5 && strncmp(str, "[Unit", 5) == 0 && !strchr(str, '_'))
00796                         break;
00797 
00798                 if (instr.eof())
00799                         return true;
00800         }
00801         bool expectMisMatch = false;
00802         // ProbeSet info.
00803         pProbeSet = &m_ProbeSets[iProbeSet];
00804         pProbeSet->m_Index = iProbeSet;
00805         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // name (ignore)
00806         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00807         m_ProbeSetNames.SetName(iProbeSet, subStr);
00808         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // direction
00809         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00810         pProbeSet->m_Direction = atoi(subStr);
00811         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // # Lists
00812         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00813         int NumCellsPerList=0;
00814         if (sscanf(subStr, "%d %d", &pProbeSet->m_NumLists, &NumCellsPerList) != 2)
00815                 NumCellsPerList = 0;
00816         pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = NumCellsPerList;
00817         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // # cells
00818         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00819         pProbeSet->m_NumCells = atoi(subStr);
00820         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // ProbeSet number
00821         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00822         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetNumber = atoi(subStr);
00823         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // type
00824         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00825         int ival = atoi(subStr);
00826 
00827         typedef enum {
00828                 UNKNOWN_TILE,
00829                 STANDARD_TILE,
00830                 BLOCK_TILE,
00831                 GENE_EXPRESSION_TILE,
00832                 CONTROL_TILE,
00833                 STANDARD_ALTERNATE_TILE,
00834                 STANDARD_VARIANT_TILE,
00835                 UNIVERSAL_TILE,
00836         COPY_NUMBER_TILE,
00837         GENOTYPE_CONTROL_TILE,
00838         EXPRESSION_CONTROL_TILE
00839         } TilingTypes;
00840 
00841         switch (ival)
00842         {
00843         case STANDARD_TILE:
00844         case STANDARD_ALTERNATE_TILE:
00845         case STANDARD_VARIANT_TILE:
00846                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = ResequencingProbeSetType;
00847                 break;
00848 
00849         case BLOCK_TILE:
00850                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = GenotypingProbeSetType;
00851                 break;
00852 
00853         case GENE_EXPRESSION_TILE:
00854                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = ExpressionProbeSetType;
00855                 break;
00856 
00857         case UNIVERSAL_TILE:
00858                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = TagProbeSetType;
00859                 break;
00860 
00861     case COPY_NUMBER_TILE:
00862         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = CopyNumberProbeSetType;
00863         break;
00864 
00865     case GENOTYPE_CONTROL_TILE:
00866         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = GenotypeControlProbeSetType;
00867         break;
00868 
00869     case EXPRESSION_CONTROL_TILE:
00870         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = ExpressionControlProbeSetType;
00871         break;
00872 
00873         default:
00874                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = UnknownProbeSetType;
00875                 break;
00876         }
00877 
00878         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // # blocks
00879         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00880         pProbeSet->m_NumGroups = atoi(subStr);
00881 
00882         // Determine the number of cells per List if not specified
00883         // in the CDF file.
00884         if (pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList == 0)
00885           {
00886             if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == GenotypingProbeSetType || 
00887                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ResequencingProbeSetType || 
00888                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == TagProbeSetType || 
00889                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == UnknownProbeSetType &&
00890                 (pProbeSet->m_NumLists != 0 && pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists == 4)) 
00891               {
00892                 pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = 4;
00893               }
00894             else if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType ||
00895                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == CopyNumberProbeSetType ||
00896                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == GenotypeControlProbeSetType ||
00897                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionControlProbeSetType) 
00898               {
00899                 if(pProbeSet->m_NumLists != 0 && 
00900                    pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists < 255) 
00901                   pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists;
00902                 else
00903                   pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = 1;
00904               }
00905             else 
00906               {
00907                 pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = 1;
00908               }
00909           }
00910         // Sanity check for relationship of m_NumCellsPerList, m_NumCells and m_NumLists
00911         if(pProbeSet->m_NumLists != 0 && 
00912            pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists < 255 &&
00913            pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList != pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists) {
00914           assert(0 && 
00915                  "CCDFFileData::ReadTextFormat(): m_NumCellsPerList != pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists");
00916         }
00917 
00918         // If this is an expression probe set and we have 2 cells per list set expectMisMatch flag.
00919         if(pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType &&
00920            pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList == 2) 
00921           expectMisMatch = true;
00922 
00923         // Get the mutation type if block tile. ignore.
00924         if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == GenotypingProbeSetType && m_Header.m_Version > 1)
00925                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00926 
00927 
00928         // Read the blocks.
00929         CCDFProbeGroupInformation *pBlk;
00930         pProbeSet->m_Groups.resize(pProbeSet->m_NumGroups);
00931         for (int iGroup=0; iGroup<pProbeSet->m_NumGroups; iGroup++)
00932         {
00933                 pBlk = &pProbeSet->m_Groups[iGroup];
00934                 pBlk->m_GroupIndex = iGroup;
00935                 pBlk->m_ProbeSetIndex = iProbeSet;
00936 
00937                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // section name - ignore
00938                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // name
00939                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00940                 pBlk->m_Name = subStr;
00941 
00942                 if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType)
00943                         m_ProbeSetNames.SetName(iProbeSet, subStr);
00944 
00945                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // block number - ignore.
00946                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // number of Lists.
00947                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00948                 pBlk->m_NumLists = atoi(subStr);
00949                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // number of cells
00950                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00951                 pBlk->m_NumCells = atoi(subStr);
00952                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // start position.
00953                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00954                 pBlk->m_Start = atoi(subStr);
00955                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // stop position
00956                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00957                 pBlk->m_Stop = atoi(subStr);
00958                 pBlk->m_NumCellsPerList = pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList;
00959                 if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == GenotypingProbeSetType && m_Header.m_Version > 2)
00960                 {
00961                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00962                         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00963                         pBlk->m_Direction = atoi(subStr);
00964                 }
00965                 else
00966                         pBlk->m_Direction = pProbeSet->m_Direction;
00967 
00968                 // Read the cells.
00969                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // header
00970                 CCDFProbeInformation cell;
00971                 pBlk->m_Cells.resize(pBlk->m_NumCells);
00972                 char unusedstr[64];
00973                 int unusedint;
00974                 unsigned int cellIndex;
00975                 int x,y;
00976                 for (int iCell=0; iCell<pBlk->m_NumCells; iCell++)
00977                 {
00978                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00979                         subStr = strchr(str, '=')+1;
00980                         int scanCount = 0;
00981                         scanCount = sscanf(subStr, "%d %d %s %s %s %d %d %*c %c %c %d",
00982                                            &x,
00983                                            &y,
00984                                            unusedstr,
00985                                            unusedstr,
00986                                            unusedstr,
00987                                            &cell.m_Expos,
00988                                            &unusedint,
00989                                            &cell.m_PBase,
00990                                            &cell.m_TBase,
00991                                            &cell.m_ListIndex);
00992                         if(scanCount != 10) {
00993                           m_strError = "Didn't get 10 entries in scan.";
00994                           return false;
00995                         }
00996                         cell.m_X = x;
00997                         cell.m_Y = y;
00998 
00999                         if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType)
01000                         {
01001                                 cellIndex = (iCell / pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList) * pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList;
01002                                 // If we are expecting pairs of PM/MM then we want the order
01003                                 // in m_Cells to be PM first and MM second.
01004                                 if (expectMisMatch && cell.m_PBase == cell.m_TBase)
01005                                         ++cellIndex;
01006                         }
01007                         else
01008                         {
01009                                 cellIndex = (iCell / pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList) * pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList;
01010                                 cellIndex += (pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList - (iCell % pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList) - 1);
01011                         }
01012 
01013                         if(cellIndex >= pBlk->m_Cells.size()) {
01014                           assert(0 && 
01015                                  "CCDFFileData::ReadTextFormat(): cellIndex cannot be larger that pBlk->m_Cells.size()" );
01016                         }
01017                         pBlk->m_Cells[cellIndex] = cell;
01018 
01019                         if (iCell==0)
01020                                 pBlk->m_Start = cell.m_ListIndex;
01021                         else if (iCell == pBlk->m_NumCells-1)
01022                                 pBlk->m_Stop = cell.m_ListIndex;
01023                 }
01024         }
01025 
01026         ++iProbeSet;
01027         goto NextProbeSet;
01028 }
